name: Rainy Day (SilverSycamore)
description:
When young, South American farm-girl, Rana's, farm is invaded by aliens, she finds a magical, frog-shaped poncho that gives her the ability to control the rain! Now, it is up to her to take up the call to adventure to save her parents!

Run, jump, strike down enemies with a lightning shield, and push enemies with rain in this pixel-style 2D platformer. 

Project created for UCF Game Production class.

2 Levels + tutorial level currently available. 

Credits:

Alberto Martinez - Producer

Jennifer Andersen-Peters - Art Team

Nicolas Kemball-Cook - Art Team

Ricardo Maldonado - Tech Lead

Christopher Perry - Tech, Design Team, Music
